name: Carriage
description: A well-crafted passenger cart favored by nobility.

parts.name: Driver's Seat
parts.description: Move up to the vehicle's speed, with one 90-degree turn. If the driver's seat is destroyed, the vehicle can't turn.

parts.name: Wheel
parts.description: Speed 30 ft. Without four wheels, the vehicle's speed is 0.

name: Cart
description: A simple, uncovered wooden cart used for hauling people or goods.

parts.name: Driver's Seat
parts.description: Move up to the vehicle's speed, with one 90-degree turn. If the driver's seat is destroyed, the vehicle can't turn.

parts.name: Wheel
parts.description: Speed 30 ft. Without four wheels, the vehicle's speed is 0.

name: Chariot
description: An open-backed cart used in combat.

parts.name: Wheel
parts.description: Speed 35 ft. Without two wheels, the vehicle's speed is 0.

name: Handcart
description: A small wooden cart, designed to be pulled by people rather than animals, bought by those who cannot afford anything nicer.

parts.name: Hand Bar
parts.description: Move up to the vehicle's speed, with one 90-degree turn. If the hand bar is destroyed, the vehicle can't turn.

parts.name: Wheel
parts.description: Speed 25 ft. Without two wheels, the vehicle's speed is 0.

name: Sled
description: A flat vehicle often pulled by trained dogs in snowy areas.

name: Wagon
description: A large, covered cart often pulled by oxen.

parts.name: Driver's Seat
parts.description: Move up to the vehicle's speed, with one 90-degree turn. If the driver's seat is destroyed, the vehicle can't turn.

parts.name: Wheel
parts.description: Speed 30 ft. Without four wheels, the vehicle's speed is 0.

name: Canoe
description: A long, thin rowboat that excels at river transport.

parts.name: Oars
parts.description:
Speed 15 ft.

Move up to the ship's speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

name: Galley
description: A large ship propelled mainly by teams of rowers.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the galley can't turn.

parts.name: Oars
parts.description:
Speed 30 ft., -5 ft. per 25 damage taken

Requires at least 40 crew.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 35 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Naval Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) bludgeoning damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

name: Galleon
description: A massive, three-masted sailing vessel.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the galleon can't turn.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 35 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

parts.name: Swivel Gun
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Keelboat
description: A small boat used for river transport.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the keelboat can't turn.

parts.name: Oars
parts.description:
Speed 20 ft., -5 ft. per 20 damage taken

Requires at least 20 crew.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 25 ft., -5 ft. per 20 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

name: Longboat
description: A long, single-masted ship favored in amphibious assaults.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longboat can't turn.

parts.name: Oars
parts.description:
Speed 20 ft., -5 ft. per 25 damage taken

Requires at least 20 crew.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 45 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

name: Rowboat
description: A small, simple rowboat.

parts.name: Oars
parts.description:
Speed 15 ft.

Move up to the ship's speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

name: Schooner
description: A large, two-masted sailing vessel built slim for speed.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 45 ft., -5 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Sloop
description: A small, single-masted sailboat.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longboat can't turn.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 50 ft., -15 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 75 ft. while sailing with the wind.

name: Warship
description: A galleon outfitted for battle, with thrity-two cannons.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to the speed of one of the ship's movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the galleon can't turn.

parts.name: Sails
parts.description:
Speed 35 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

parts.name: Swivel Gun
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Cannon
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 600/2400 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

name: Balloon
description: A large balloon that uses hot air to stay airborne.

parts.name: Burner
parts.description:
Move up to 30 ft. up and up to 30 ft. with the wind.

If the burner is destroyed, the vehicle can't fly.

parts.name: Balloon
parts.description:
Speed 30 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

If the balloon is destroyed, the vehicle can't fly.

name: Dirigible
description: A balloon outfitted with propellors that allow more control and speed.

parts.name: Burner
parts.description:
Move up to 30 ft. up and up to 30 ft. with the wind, or up to the propellor's speed.

If the burner is destroyed, the vehicle can't fly.

parts.name: Balloon
parts.description:
Speed 30 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

If the balloon is destroyed, the vehicle can't fly.

parts.name: Propellors
parts.description:
Speed 30 ft., -10 ft. per 25 damage taken

If the propellors are destroyed, the vehicle can't move of its own accord, and moves with the wind.

name: Ornithopter
description: A winged contraption that flies like a bird.

parts.name: Driver's Seat
parts.description:
Move up to 30 ft. up and up to the wings' speed.

If the driver's seat is destroyed, the vehicle can't fly.

parts.name: Wings
parts.description:
Speed 45 ft., -10 ft. per 10 damage taken

The vehicle can't fly if the wings are destroyed.

name: Angelship
description: Angelships are small spelljammers originally built by kobolds.  Very few remain crewed by kobolds.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Bombard
description: Bombards are built by giff. The major feature of each ship is an enormous cannon that fires massive cannon balls capable of blowing other ships to smithereens.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Giant Cannon
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 600/2400 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Citadel
description: A citadel is a massive dwarven spelljammer made from an asteroid.  They are used more like mobile bases than vessels, and often are home to mining teams of dwarves, traveling the Astral Sea in search of resources.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 25 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Damselfly
description: This swift but cramped ship is made mostly of metal. It can't float on water, but its legs enable it to land safely on the ground. A sliding hatch just behind the wings allows access to the ship's mangonel turret. The ship's cargo hold can easily be turned into crew cabins or another weapon deck.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Dolphin
description: Dolphins are enclosed spelljammers designed for commercial voyages.  The top section of the ship is detatchable, and serves as a small shuttle capable of landing on solid ground.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Dragonfly
description: Dragonflies are smaller variants of damselflies.  They are among the most accessible spelljammers, and many academies use them to train new helmsmen.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

name: Dreadnautiloid
description: Built and used by mind flayers, dreadnautiloids are rare, massive versions of their usual nautiloids. They can't float on water, nor can they land safely on the ground.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Piercing Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) piercing damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

parts.name: Tentacles
parts.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one Huge or Gargantuan target. Hit: 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage, and the nautiloid's speed becomes 0 until its spelljammer uses an action to release the target. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). If the target is another ship, the target's speed becomes 0 until the nautiloid releases it, or until the target or the nautiloid drops to 0 hit points.

parts.name: Teleport
parts.description: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space aboard the nautiloid that the nautiloid's spelljammer can see.

name: Eel
description: Eels are small, crude spelljammers similar to lampreys.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Entship
description: Druids, rangers, and clerics devoted to gods of nature are often found aboard entships, as are Wildspace explorers who don't want to have to worry about their ship's air envelope becoming fouled during a long voyage. This ship's main distinctive feature is the fully grown treant on the aft deck. The treant has a speed of 0 because its roots are woven into the deck; it and the ship are inseparable. If the ship is reduced to 0 hit points, the treant dies of shock. The ship can function if its treant dies, but the treant can never be replaced with another.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

name: Flying Fish
description: Aside from space galleons, flying fish ships are the most common vessels in Wildspace, favorites among merchants and adventurers alike.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Hammerhead
description: Hammerhead ships are popular craft, especially among pirates and merchants carrying heavy cargo. They can float on water and sail across it, but they aren't built to land on the ground (their keels would cause them to tip to one side). Standard weapons on a hammerhead ship include fore and aft mangonels, a ballista, and a reinforced bow for ramming.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Blunt Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) bludgeoning damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

name: Lamprey
description: Lamprey ships are antiquated, being among the oldest spelljamming ships still in use. Psurlons are particularly fond of them. Using the metal grappling jaws built into its bow, a lamprey ship can attach itself to another ship, which is a critical feature during boarding actions. Other standard weapons include four ballistae on the main deck.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Grappling Jaws
parts.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one ship or Gargantuan creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) piercing damage, and the speed of the lamprey ship and the target become 0 until the grapple ends. As an action, a creature can use the grappling jaws' controls to release the target. Otherwise, the effect ends when the target or the lamprey ship drops to 0 hit points.

name: Narwhal
description: A narwhal is a modified dolphin ship, with a piercing ram added to the hull.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Piercing Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) piercing damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

name: Nautiloid
description: Built and used by mind flayers, nautiloids are designed exclusively for space travel. They can't float on water, nor can they land safely on the ground.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Tentacles
parts.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one Huge or Gargantuan target. Hit: 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage, and the nautiloid's speed becomes 0 until its spelljammer uses an action to release the target. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). If the target is another ship, the target's speed becomes 0 until the nautiloid releases it, or until the target or the nautiloid drops to 0 hit points.

parts.name: Teleport
parts.description: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space aboard the nautiloid that the nautiloid's spelljammer can see.

name: Nightspider
description: Neogi terrorize Wildspace in ships of their own construction, which others call nightspiders. These vessels often wait in ambush for other ships. Once a target ship is identified, the neogi try to steal its spelljamming helm and capture its crew.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Mosquito
description: Mosquitos are the smallest spelljammers capable of travel fully on their own.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

name: Scorpion
description: Scorpion ships are archaic metal warships that have never lost their popularity, largely because of their versatility. Articulated legs enable a scorpion ship to land safely on the ground and move across a solid surface at a walking speed of 30 feet.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 30 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Claw
parts.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the creature takes 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.

name: Shrike
description: This swift vessel is a relatively recent design, quickly gaining popularity with merchants and pirates. A shrike ship's legs enable it to land safely on the ground. The ship can float but isn't built for traveling on water and sinks quickly in rough seas.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 70 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Piercing Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) piercing damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

name: Sidewinder
description: Sidewinders are gnomish spelljammers built out of scrap.  Each sidewinder is unique in design.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 40 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

name: Space Galleon
description: The space galleon is a mainstay among the host of vessels that ply Wildspace and the Astral Sea. Space galleons can easily pass for ordinary seafaring galleons. Because they can land on water and move across it like their namesakes, they can sail into ports on terrestrial worlds without attracting undue attention.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 35 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Squid Ship
description: Among the oldest types of spelljamming vessels, squid ships are popular with privateers and are often used as patrol ships. Standard weapons on a squid ship include a forward-mounted mangonel, two aft-mounted ballistae, and a reinforced bow for ramming. The tentacles that extend from the bow account for nearly half the ship's keel length.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 30 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Piercing Ram
parts.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 0 ft., one object or Gargantuan or larger creature. Hit: 88 (16d10) piercing damage. The ship takes half as much damage and comes to a dead stop.

On a miss, the attack deals no damage, the target moves into the nearest unoccupied space that isn't in the ship's path, and the ship can continue moving if it has any movement left.

The ship's helmsman can make the following attack when the ship runs into another object or into a Gargantuan or larger creature.

name: Star Moth
description: Star moths are ships constructed and flown by astral elves, who don't like it when these ships end up in the hands of others. A star moth's hull is fashioned from a grown and sculpted organic substance, and its enormous, decorative wings are made of shimmering crystal.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 50 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

name: Turtle Ship
description: A turtle ship is encased in a protective metal shell, as befits its name, and bristles with weapons. In addition to its roomy quarters, it can carry a decent-sized payload, making it popular among traders and others who need a lot of cargo space. The ship can land on the ground, and it floats on water. Sliding panels can be closed to make the hull airtight, enabling the ship to travel underwater safely, even to great depths. If the ship takes damage while on or under the water, interior hatches can be sealed to prevent the ship from flooding completely.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 25 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

parts.name: Mangonel
parts.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

Can't hit targets within 60 feet.

parts.name: Torpedo Tube
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 500/1000 ft., one target. Hit: 44 (8d10) bludgeoning damage.

name: Wasp
description: Wasp ships are lightweight wooden vessels capable of landing safely on the ground, but not on water. They appeal to adventurers because they're affordable and don't require a large crew. Pirates like them because they're swift. Aristocrats are fond of using them as flying yachts because the ship's cargo hold can be easily converted into posh living quarters.

parts.name: Helm
parts.description: Move up to 50 ft., with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

parts.name: Ballista
parts.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) piercing damage.
